statements: DELETE FROM project_reports WHERE status = 'In Progress';
DELETE FROM project_status WHERE project_id = 101 AND status = 'In Progress'
DELETE FROM resource_utilization WHERE hours_worked > 40 AND project_id IN (SELECT project_id FROM project_status WHERE status = 'Completed')
DELETE FROM ResourceUtilization WHERE project_id = 5 AND utilization_rate < 0.6;
DELETE FROM ProjectStatus WHERE project_name = 'Project A' AND start_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM Task WHERE team_id = 2 AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
